channel.title: Quake3 on Ponte Posterum
channel.description: Recent content in Quake3 on Ponte Posterum

item.title: Quake3 0
item.description: Quake 3 ~ ioquake3 I’ve covered DOOM in one of my previous blogs. In this blog I am going to cover how to get Quake 3 arena running. The source port I am going to use is ioquake3. Unlike DOOM, there is no entirely free version of Quake 3. Quake 3 requires .pak files, which can found in the game files after purchasing Quake 3 on steam. The following dependencies are required.
